title: Sibling Advicery: Swallowing/Lying for Jobs
description:
This week on Sibling Advicery, Bob and Monét help a baby gay whose new to sex, urge a woman caught in a toxic on-again-off-again relationship to move on, help someone who lied on their resume navigate truth telling, and so much more!!
Go to uomabeauty.com/SIBLING to get 20% off site wide!
Go to PrettyLitter.com/rivalry to save 20% on your 1st order!
Visit Audible.com/rivalry or text rivalry to 500-500.
Don’t fall for subscription scams. Start cancelling today at Truebill.com/RIVALRY.
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
